mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, ROLE) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{role})
INSERT INTO USER (USERNAME, PROVIDER, SOCIAL_ID) values (#{username}, #{provider}, #{socialId})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT SEQ FROM USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENT_INFO (NAME, SOCIAL_NUMBER, RELATE, USER) values (#{name}, #{socialNumber}, #{relate}, #{user})
